```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(stringr)
```

```{r}
langlist <- c("slqz","tlac")
df <- data.frame(zap= character(0), gloss=character(0), trans=character(0),lang=character(0),stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
for(i in 1:length(langlist)){
  lang <- langlist[i]
  filename <- paste(c("~/scrapy/ralady/",lang,"_talkdict.csv"),collapse="")
  df <- read.csv(filename)
  df <- subset(df, select = -c(prev,sourcepage) )
  df <- unique(df)
  df$source <- lang
  names(df)[names(df) == 'source'] <- 'lang'
  df <- subset(df, select = -c(id) )
}
```
